      • setIndex

        public void setIndex​(int index)
        Sets the current plant to be "index", clamped to be within range. This can be used for gain scheduling to make the current model match changed plant behavior.
        Parameters:
        index - The plant index.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the current plant index.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the plant.

        public void update​(Matrix<States,​N1> x,
                   Matrix<Inputs,​N1> u)
        Computes the new x and y given the control input.
        Parameters:
        x - The current state.
        u - The control input.

      • updateX

        public Matrix<States,​N1> updateX​(Matrix<States,​N1> x,
                                       Matrix<Inputs,​N1> u)
        Computes the new x given the old x and the control input.

        This is used by state observers directly to run updates based on state estimate.

        Parameters:
        x - The current state.
        u - The control input.

      • updateY

        public Matrix<Outputs,​N1> updateY​(Matrix<States,​N1> x,

        Computes the new y given the control input.

        This is used by state observers directly to run updates based on state estimate.

        u - The control input.
